title: Standert Triebwerk Disc updates modern steel road bike, adds new LTD edition
content:
Standert’s steel Triebwerk Disc road bike gets a subtle new update that makes it both more modern & more classic at the same time. First, careful tweaks to the rear end make room for bigger tires without impacting chainstay length, while a slimmer tapered carbon fork transitions more smoothly with traditional steel tubing style. And […]

The post Standert Triebwerk Disc updates modern steel road bike, adds new LTD edition appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
